message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SD

The paper proposes a method for pattern classification using discriminative dictionary learning. This falls under the broad category of machine learning and computer vision. Specifically, the paper focuses on incorporating locality information into the learned dictionary and using a support vector discriminative term to jointly learn a classifier. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper utilizes optimization techniques and regularization, which are common in sub-categories such as cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.SD (Systems and Control).
